name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Press dumbbells overhead from shoulder height.
Lower with control to start position.
Keep core engaged.
tips: Avoid arching lower back; brace core.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells laterally to shoulder level with slight elbow bend.
Lower slowly to starting position.
Use controlled tempo and small weights initially.
tips: Focus on mid-deltoid activation; avoid momentum.
ratingDesc: Key for shoulder width and shape.

name: Seated Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Lean forward on bench and raise dumbbells to side focusing on rear delts.
Squeeze shoulder blades at top.
Lower with control.
tips: Keep motion strict to avoid traps dominating.
ratingDesc: Great for shoulder balance and posture.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Rotate palms during press from facing you to facing forward at top.
Lower with control rotating palms back.
Maintain steady tempo.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Pull rope to face level, separate hands and squeeze shoulder blades.
Return under control.
Keep elbows high and external rotation.
tips: Excellent for shoulder health and posture.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Raise weight in front to shoulder height keeping arms slightly bent.
Lower slowly with control.
Use moderate weight to avoid swinging.
tips: Control eccentric phase to protect shoulders.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Pull weight to chest with elbows high and out.
Lower with control.
Keep a moderate grip to avoid impingement.
tips: Use moderate ROM; stop if shoulder pain occurs.
ratingDesc: Powerful for traps but attention to shoulder health needed.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Use low cable and raise arm laterally to shoulder height.
Control return.
Keep movement strict and avoid momentum.
